name: Neha Kulkarni
warning_signs: Decreased urine output or dark-colored urine
follow_up_instructions: Monitor blood pressure daily and log readings
Attend dialysis sessions as scheduled (3 times per week)
Restrict fluid intake to 1.5 liters per day
discharge_summary:
Patient Neha Kulkarni was admitted on 2025-09-05 with Post-Transplant Follow-up. 
During hospitalization, patient was managed with Metformin 500mg twice daily, Lisinopril 10mg daily, Insulin glargine 20 units at bedtime. 
Procedures performed included Peritoneal dialysis catheter insertion, Ultrasound-guided kidney drainage.
Patient's condition improved and was stable at discharge. 
Discharged home with instructions to follow up with nephrologist and continue medications as prescribed. 
Patient educated on warning signs and dietary restrictions.
